answers.answer: I'm in the US And my doctor won't let me go past 37 weeks so Imagine 38 correct

Both of them girls was going to get my tubes tied but I would really like a son so I'm going to try one more pregnancy for a son and then I'm tying my tubesI'm done

title: irish mammys please? 38week induction for gd
